Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1999024 affecting package numpy for versions less than 1.26.3-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-1999024 affecting package numpy for versions less than 1.26.3-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package numpy is earlier than 1.26.3-4, affected by CVE-2018-1999024
